dishData.name: Margherita Pizza
dishData.description: A delicious pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves. Available in medium and large sizes. Choose from a range of toppings to create your perfect pizza.

dishData.name: Beef Burger
dishData.description: A juicy burger with a grilled beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, ketchup, and mustard. Served with a side of fries.

dishData.name: Spaghetti
dishData.description: A classic Italian dish with spaghetti pasta, tomato sauce, and homemade meatballs. Topped with Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

dishData.name: Mixed Salad
dishData.description: A fresh salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, avocado, and your choice of dressing. Add grilled chicken or shrimp for extra protein.

dishData.name: Beef Tacos
dishData.description: Three soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef, diced onion, cilantro, and homemade salsa. Served with a side of rice and beans.

dishData.name: Sushi Rolls
dishData.description: A selection of sushi rolls with fresh fish, avocado, cucumber, and pickled ginger. Includes California rolls, spicy tuna rolls, and rainbow rolls.
